name: PowerPoint Presentation Creator
description:
This tool creates a slide presentation locally using an intelligent layout engine that automatically arranges text and images into grids, split-screens, or cinematic stacks based on their shape.

To use it, just ask for a presentation, set the vibe, and provide your text and local images or graphs full paths to use per slide.
author: @@official.shinkai

instruction.description: Natural language request describing the slides to create (required).

filename.description: Optional filename for the output (extension optional, no path).

saved_pptx_local_file_path.description: Full path to the saved .pptx file (empty string if error).
saved_pptx_local_file_path.name: saved_pptx_local_file_path
